Title: The Thing in the Pit
Plot: Having performed shamefully in the arena against Crixus, Spartacus is forced to fight in the Pits. Batiatus, determined to profit from Spartacus, may be at risk if his debts aren't repaid.
ParentalRatingReason: R18 Violence,offensive language and sex scenes
Writer: Aaron Helbing, Todd Helbing, Steven S. DeKnight
